title: Hotdog-Sandwich Taxonomy Consensus Framework

prerequisites: Gain buy-in from key stakeholder groups
steps.outcome: Create a legitimate, authoritative body to define and maintain hotdog-sandwich taxonomy
risks: Potential for Council decisions to be ignored or disputed

steps.outcome: Taxonomy that recognizes both structural sandwich criteria and distinct cultural/culinary hotdog identity

steps.action: Implement Flexible Labeling and Regulatory Standards

steps.outcome: Clear, consistent guidelines for food service, packaging, and consumer understanding
risks: Potential for loopholes or inconsistent application

prerequisites: Establish Hybrid Taxonomy as authoritative standard
steps.outcome: Broad public awareness and acceptance of Hybrid Taxonomy

prerequisites: Establish HSCC as permanent governing body
steps.outcome: Maintain relevance and legitimacy of Hybrid Taxonomy over time

Expertise in food science, culinary history, taxonomy, and public policy
